message.raw:
updated install.sh to be compatible with Mac OSX 10.12 and 10.13

- added version cases to change the open_ssl and zlib flags
- tested on Mac OSX 10.12, same flag change was noted in user group as solving problems in 10.13
- tested on Debian and Ubuntu to ensure other installs were not affected
message.html:

  • added version cases to change the open_ssl and zlib flags

message:
updated install.sh to be compatible with Mac OSX 10.12 and 10.13

- added version cases to change the open_ssl and zlib flags
- tested on Mac OSX 10.12, same flag change was noted in user group as solving problems in 10.13
- tested on Debian and Ubuntu to ensure other installs were not affected
